transcript_chunks.text: yeah this is all this is an argument that shouldn't even be had anymore okay they came up with a technology in the 80s that made laces completely obsolete the velcro the velcro and for some [ __ ] dumb reason we decided to just totally throw that out the window not just as an aside I remember how much of a revelation was when I learned how to tie my shoes I remember just being so daunted and like I'm never going to be able to learn how to do this if I sat there and thought about how I tied shoe I wouldn't be able to do it oh no like I just have to not think about it and just tie clear it clear the mechanism yeah it was hard for me I was one of them dumb kids real dumb kids I was like holding on them velcros as long as possible cuz I just I'd always mess it up and it's just like great and then the worst thing is you mess it up you know you get it when you're going to school and you're like all right I got it I'm good then it unties randomly and you're like I'm completely and utterly

then the worst thing is you mess it up you know you get it when you're going to school and you're like all right I got it I'm good then it unties randomly and you're like I'm completely and utterly [ __ ] yeah I don't know everyone's going to make fun of me then people start to notice how long it's taking tie Sho why is it taking him so long to tie his shoes kid so many voices one of them dumb kids people start doubting themselves like maybe I can help wait wait do I know how to tie sh [ __ ]
